com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core

Class ObjectContextNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core.ObjectContextNotifier

  • public class ObjectContextNotifier
extends Object
    This is a singleton class used to register for notifications from ObjectContext events, such as inserted objects, changed objects, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ObjectContextNotifier.DefaultObjectContextListener
      Provides a default empty implementation of the ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener.
      static interface  ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener
      Defines the interface which ObjectContext listeners must implement to receive notifications of relevant events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectContextNotifier() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void registerListener(ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified of events from all ObjectContexts used by the application.
      static void registerListener(ObjectContext forContext, ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified of events from the specified ObjectContext.
      static void unregisterListener(ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener from receiving events for all ObjectContexts used by the application.
      static void unregisterListener(ObjectContext forContext, ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener from receiving events for the specified object context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectContextNotifier

        public ObjectContextNotifier()

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public static void registerListener(ObjectContext forContext,
                    ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
        Registers a listener to be notified of events from the specified ObjectContext. If the listener was previously registered for events from all ObjectContexts, registration is ignored.

        Note: An application must unregister the listener when it is no longer interested in the events to prevent memory leaks.

        Parameters:
        forContext - the ObjectContext to listen for
        listener - the listener to register
        See Also:
        registerListener(ObjectContextListener)

      • registerListener

        public static void registerListener(ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
        Registers a listener to be notified of events from all ObjectContexts used by the application.

        Note: An application must unregister the listener when you are no longer interested in the events to prevent memory leaks.

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        See Also:
        registerListener(ObjectContext, ObjectContextListener)

      • unregisterListener

        public static void unregisterListener(ObjectContext forContext,
                      ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener from receiving events for the specified object context.
        Parameters:
        forContext - the ObjectContext to unregister for
        listener - the listener to unregister
        See Also:
        unregisterListener(ObjectContextListener)

      • unregisterListener

        public static void unregisterListener(ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener from receiving events for all ObjectContexts used by the application.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister
        See Also:
        unregisterListener(ObjectContext, ObjectContextListener)
